name: Retinol Eye Stick
categories: Skincare, Eye Care, Eye Creams & Treatments
about: What it is:A serum balm made with encapsulated retinol to help target the look of fine lines and dark circles around the eyes, now with an even smoother glide..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Loss of Firmness and Elasticity, and Dark Circles.Formulation:Balm.Highlighted Ingredients:- Encapsulated Retinol: Softens the look of fine lines and wrinkles while visibly smoothing texture..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:Newly reformulated to improve its glide, this upgraded balm helps improve the look of fine lines, dark circles, and skin texture in just one swipe. This easy-to-use stick formula contains encapsulated retinol, peptides, and bakuchiol to deliver visibly brighter, more even-looking skin around your eyes.
ingredients: Squalane, Synthetic Wax, Diisostearyl Malate, Mica, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Rhus Succedanea Fruit Wax, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Ethylene/Propylene Copolymer, Hydrogenated Rice Bran Oil, Retinol, Bakuchiol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Heptasodium Hexacarboxymethyl Dipeptide-12, Biotinoyl Hexapeptide-2 Amide, Astaxanthin, Ubiquinone, Astragalus Membranaceus Root Extract, Spilanthes Acmella Flower Extract, Terminalia Arjuna Extract, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cellulose Acetate Butyrate, Haematococcus Pluvialis Extract, Lecithin, Caprylyl Glycol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tricaprylin, Oleic Acid, Tocopherol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Phenoxyethanol, Water (Aqua/Eau)....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-In the evening after cleansing, gently swipe the balm around your entire eye area. .-Sensitive skin? Begin using one to three times a week to allow skin time to adjust to retinol. ..-For maximum age-defying results, pair with Retinol Face Stick (sold separately) for all-over fine line and wrinkle fighting...Warning: Avoid contact directly with the eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this eye balm, but be cautious! I use Tretinoin on my face, but never near my eyes. I began getting lines and milia under my eyes and it was not cute. I saw this Peace Out balm and decided to give it a try. Knowing that I'm so sensitive to anything around my eyes, I took some precautions, and it's worked perfectly. I never apply the balm directly under my eyes. There's not enough control over where the balm is going. I use a qtip to apply the balm very carefully. I then pat it in with my ring finger. After using the balm, I apply a nice under eye moisturizer to keep the thin under eye skin from drying out, or peeling. Just because it's not a prescription doesn't mean it can't cause an issue. Treat all skin products, especially for around the eyes, with respect. Always patch test to a tiny area of your skin to make sure you won't have a reaction. Apply sparingly at first to see what your skin will tolerate. Looking good is great, but being healthy is fantastic! Hope this helps someone. :-)

reviews.review_text: I had a terrible reaction to this product, causing severe dermatitis around my eye area where it was used. I have also used tretinoin and have never experienced anything worse than the typical dryness and flaking in the first few weeks, so this is not a retinol intolerance. This was an absolutely horrible experience - this product is not worth the risk

reviews.review_text: As an avid skincare enthusiast, I was thrilled to try out the Peace Out Retinol Eye Stick, and it did not disappoint! This powerhouse product combines convenience with effectiveness, thanks to its innovative design and potent ingredients. The stick format makes application a breeze, with the angled tip ensuring precise coverage and minimal product waste. I appreciated the advanced easy-glide technology, which allowed the product to effortlessly melt into my skin without tugging or pulling. Formulated with encapsulated retinol, peptides, and vegan Astaxanthin, this eye stick delivers impressive results. After incorporating it into my nightly routine, I noticed a visible improvement in the appearance of fine lines, dark circles, and overall skin texture. My under-eye area looked brighter, smoother, and more hydrated. I also love that Peace Out prioritizes sustainability, using 100% post-consumer recycled material for the packaging. It's a win-win for my skin and the planet! Overall, I highly recommend the Peace Out Retinol Eye Stick to anyone looking to combat signs of aging around the eyes. It's easy to use, effective, and environmentally friendlyu2014a must-have addition to any skincare routine.

reviews.review_text: After seeing this product go viral online I really wanted to give the Peace Out Retinol Eye Stick a try; however, I was super disappointed with the product and did not feel it lived up to the hype. And while I love the concept of the product, I want a product where I can see results.  A little bit about me - I experience texture and milia under my eye, but I struggle to find texture reducing products (like retinol) that feel easy and safe to apply around the eyes. When this particular stick went viral, I was stoked because the application method seemed so foolproof.  Packaging-wise, I did find that the balm was easy to apply around the eye area. Unlike some who have sad the product was stiff, mine always felt emollient enough to apply around the eyes directly from the tube without tugging at the sensitive skin under my eyes. That being said, my balm broke off from the base within a few weeks of owning this product and applying nightly despite the fact that very little of the product was twisted up / exposed outside of the tube. Although I've been able to apply the product despite being broken, it always makes me nervous that the whole stick will fall out of the component with each application.  The above component/breakage issue could have been forgiven had I seen results. However, I unfortunately saw no real improvements to the texture of my skin of my under eyes even after several months of use.  I cannot recommend this product due to the faulty tube and the lack of noticeable results. The only reason that this has 2-stars is due to my appreciation of the concept, liking the application (prior to the stick breaking within the component), and the enjoyment of the actual texture of the product.

reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Peace Out Retinol Eye Stick and I must say, it has exceeded my expectations! This product has truly been a game-changer for my tired eyes and dark circles.   First of all, I love that Peace Out is committed to sustainability. The fact that this eye stick is now made with 100% post-consumer recycled material shows their dedication to the environment, which is something I greatly appreciate as a consumer.  The advanced easy-glide technology is fantastic. It allows the eye stick to effortlessly glide onto my skin, making application a breeze. The angled tip is a brilliant addition as it ensures precise and easy application, while also reducing product waste. I love that I can target the areas that need attention without worrying about using too much product.  The retinol formula in this eye stick is truly powerful. It has helped diminish my fine lines and improve the overall texture of my under-eye area. I've noticed a significant reduction in discoloration as well, which has been a big concern for me. I feel like my eyes look brighter and more rejuvenated after using this product consistently.  Another great aspect of the Peace Out Retinol Eye Stick is its portability. The compact size makes it perfect for travel or on-the-go touch-ups. I can easily toss it in my bag and use it whenever my eyes need a pick-me-up.  Overall, I highly recommend the Peace Out Retinol Eye Stick. It's an effective and sustainable solution for tired eyes, dark circles, fine lines, and texture issues. The easy-glide technology, angled tip, and powerful retinol formula make it a must-have in my skincare routine. Give it a try and say goodbye to your under-eye concerns! Gifted by Peace Out Skincare
